pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, July 13, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, July 13, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer after the meeting.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an important announcement. A media availability will follow.

Centre Block, Senate Foyer
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
